attributes.action: reorganise the Social services of Great Britain, this new department will be two tier, with social workers on the ground having the power to deal with a wide range of issues from supporting and advising single mums, working with all children accused of criminal offences & their families, dealing with th seperation of families, from agreeing access to children, rehousing, benifit advise, to paying maintance, domestic abuse and the elderly in terms of housing, benifits and wellbeing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The list of services available under the new department is an example of social support, but will be extended on consultation, the work done by this department must be done without the need of initial court action. The second tier will be administrative staff responsible for writing reports, advising authorities of situations, liaising with police on topics such as the need for children to be taken into care, suspected abuse matters etc.This department must be constructed to have the general public's support in seeing that it is there to help them in the running of their everyday life's, and not a government body set up to interfre in people's home life.
